normalised: Driving on Indian roads, eh? More like surviving! My last trip from Delhi to Jaipur on N-H forty eight felt like a rally race... except the rally car was my Maruti eight hundred and the competitors were cows and overloaded trucks. Got there eventually, only six hours late.
